message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity given its value to you and our confidence in its quality.
Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of our product.
